entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
